short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows sorting of Tesco groceries by price/weight including Clubcard prices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to sort groceries on Tesco.com by price per kg or price per litre rather than just by price. It adds Clubcard price/weight or price/volume and sorts on this where available.

The source code can be found at https://github.com/JadeDickinson/tesco_chrome_extension.
